tool_description: Simple Api for the latest gold price per ounce
name: Gold price live
title: Gold price live

api_list.name: Get gold price per ounce
api_list.description: This end point will return back the latest gold price per ounce
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-price-live1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-price-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-price-live1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-price-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
